simple: Improvements for mobile devices and minor fixes.

fix: Fixed an error, where the wrong file-size was given to the browser (download failed)
feat: On small devices (like smartphones) the preview image is now shown in the same size as on larger devices and can be panned sideways. Also added a (hopefully) helpful animation to make clear that the preview can be panned sideways.
chore: Fixed a typo in the english translation
